item.description:
Saturday April 24th 2010 packed full of fun

(Optional) 5:00pm to 7:00pm ==> Aaroh - A journey down the memory lane and a non-stop Bollywood music extravaganza @ Keefe Technical School, 750, Winter Street, Framingham, MA 01702. Tickets can be purchased at the door. More details @ http://aaroh-us.com/...

This time we are aiming Indian cuisine. Dinner @ Minerva in Natick @ 7 pm. Please RSVP so that i can reserve the table accordingly.

Fun doesnt end here, some of us are planning to go for Vaisakhi celebration, a bollywood bhangra nite, Chak de Phatte event @ Mantra 52 Temple Place ,Boston ,MA ,02116

Lots happening this Saturday :) Drop me an email if you have any questions.

Cheers!!!
Nitin
nitin.mewada@gmail.com
item.name: Music, Dinner and more Music ....
